ComicInfo.Summary:
Notorious Chapter One: The new super hero Notorious is battling crime boss Murtha's gang; secretly, he's one of Murtha's own employees.
Sins of the Father Part One of Five: Years ago, an extraterrestrial being called Dominex challenged Captain Dynamo, Omni-Man & Supreme's might all at once; now, his three sons have come to Earth to avenge their father's honor.
ComicInfo.Title: Notorious Chapter One; Sins of the Father Part One of Five
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Kelsey Shannon,Mahmud A. Asrar,Marc Deering,Ron Riley
